Text: The quality is really blurry. I don't know if that was like that on the original, though.

@libellus2:

This was the source [the only one available for me]: Jane.Eyre.DVD.{WwW[.]IbizaTorrent[.]Net}.  Blurry as you see !

And ...Yes: this is all I could get out of this .. dvd !!!

When I'll get another and better source you'll have another and better rip !

That's all I can promise!

Until than...enjoy this one ... if you can !!

...and please don't discourage downloaders/seeders!

The quality is...more than watchable ! In some scenes  there are problems with details when characters are filmed from distance!!

Cheers.
